messages:
Name: João Pereira
Nationality: Portugal
Date of Birth: February 25, 1984
Position: Defender
Current club: Sporting CP
Primeira Liga clubs played for: Benfica, Gil Vicente, Sporting Braga, Sporting CP

Sporting CP defender João Pereira has taken part in five Primeira Liga games in 2020/2021 since joining the club on February 4, 2021, being selected in the starting XI in three of these and coming on as a substitute on two occasions.

The last time that Pereira featured in the league came on May 19 for Sporting CP versus Marítimo; a meeting that he played 59 minutes in during a 5-1 success. He has been shown one yellow card, as well as sent off once.
Pereira played 28 Süper Lig games last season for Trabzonspor, scored one goal and provided five assists.
Pereira linked up with Sporting CP in February 2021 from Trabzonspor, for whom he made 106 league appearances in total, scoring three goals and providing 14 assists.
